item.title: All About Ori Dair
item.description: Ori Dair on the surface seems quite linear, but with clever usage of hitfalling and calculated risk, it can lead into some dangerous confirms and net you some early and satisfying kills. Hitfall Kills Onstage Copied link! While onstage, you have access to strong attacks, and coupled with Dair’s hefty hitstun, you have access to stable setups into your strongs. Dair > Fstrong Copied link! While many of Ori’s kill setups require DI reads or guessing, Dair > Fstrong can be done on reaction.
